thread.title: Shah Rukh Khan conferred with honorary doctorate at University of Edinburgh

author: newsr.in
title: Shah Rukh Khan conferred with honorary doctorate at University of Edinburgh
text: Shah Rukh Khan added a good dose of his trademark wit and wisdom to his speech at the University of Edinburgh after he was conferred with a doctorate. He stated, “What defines you is your heart. Ask the artist formerly known as Prince.*The Princess Royal of Edinburgh confers the doctorate degree (Honoris Causa) on Shah Rukh ... »
